venue_description: The Desert International Horse Park in Thermal, California spans nearly 1.6 million square feet of competition and riding space, making it one of the largest equestrian facilities in North America. From October through March the park offers 14 weeks of world‑class hunter‑jumper competition and five weeks of dressagehttps://theorg.com/org/desert-international-horse-park.
sourced: Desert International Horse Park, DIHP Desert Circuit schedule

prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for Desert International Horse Park  (venue_uid=desc-venue)","Location":"city: Thermal city_uid=thermal, state:CA state_uid=ca.","GEO context":"lat=33.639952, lon=-116.176505 placeid=Ei44NTU1NSBBaXJwb3J0IEJsdmQgIzJjLCBUaGVybWFsLCBDQSA5MjI3NCwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgl_PBJaD1nagBE_AbkIHxI4GxICMmM.","Official venue link":"https://deserthorsepark.com/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://deserthorsepark.com/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "desc-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "Desert International Horse Park — Venue Profile",
  "section_overview": "Thermal runs like clockwork: big schedules, wide aisles, and serious mileage on the all-weather. Expect busy warm-up rings before every eq and FEI block, a clearly marked jog strip by the main arenas, and a well-stocked vendor row for last-minute hardware or turnout saves. Stabling is in tidy pods with easy access to schooling and wash racks—golf carts help but you can walk it if you plan your time. Mornings start cool and can turn to dry heat + breeze by mid-day, so manage hydration, fly spray, and coolers. The main stadium under the lights rides electric; hunters and eq stay smooth on the outer rings with consistent, drag-on-time footing.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "Desert International Horse Park",
    "Thermal CA",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix arena",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit",
    "all-weather footing"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Dial in your DIHP game plan",
  "section_img": "https://deserthorsepark.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/dihp-grand-prix-arena.jpg",
  "section_img_alt": "Main arena at Desert International Horse Park with stadium seating and riders schooling",
  "section_link": "https://deserthorsepark.com/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for Desert International Horse Park (Thermal, CA): warm-up flow, jog strip, vendor row, stabling layout, and footing tips for A-circuit hunter/jumper riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "Desert Horse Park — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Practical notes on warm-up timing, the jog strip, vendor row essentials, stabling pods, and all-weather footing so you can move efficiently all week in Thermal.",
  "section_search_title": "Desert International Horse Park Venue Profile",
  "section_search_description": "Authoritative rider-focused overview of DIHP in Thermal, CA: ring flow, jog strip details, vendor row, stabling, and show-day logistics for hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for DIHP",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up strategy: peak traffic before eq, jr/am hunters, and FEI—flat early, then grab a vertical/oxer window just after a drag.",
      "Footing rhythm: all-weather stays consistent—plan last fences to land right after water/drag for best purchase.",
      "Jog strip: arrive ring-ready with number visible; keep a towel and hoof oil handy for quick polish in the breeze.",
      "Shade & hydration: tents and misters help, but pack extra water, electrolytes, and coolers for both horse and rider.",
      "Wind watch: secure saddle pads and numbers; bring goggles or clear lenses for night classes if dust kicks up.",
      "Stabling flow: trunks flush, fans strapped, hose lines tidy—high traffic before drags, so stage ice boots and studs box alternatives nearby.",
      "Vendor row: fast fixes—spur straps, gloves, stud kits, hairnets, boot polish—and on-the-spot braiding/tack repairs.",
      "Schooling access: add 5–10 minutes from stabling to the stadium under the lights; golf carts move fastest between drags.",
      "Night classes: brighter and louder—earplugs optional; give yourself an extra school to let them clock the atmosphere.",
      "Logistics: schedule farrier/vet outside prime hunter blocks; hay/grain deliveries land smoother mid-afternoon."
    ]
  }
}

venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes

venue_descriptionv2: The Desert International Horse Park in Thermal, California spans nearly 1.6 million square feet of competition and riding space, making it one of the largest equestrian facilities in North America. From October through March the park offers 14 weeks of worldâ€‘class hunterâ€‘jumper competition and five weeks of dressagehttps://theorg.com/org/desert-international-horse-park.
